title: Weather and Seasons Patterns

vocab.definition: What it's like outside - sunny, rainy, cloudy, or snowy
Different times of year when weather changes
How hot or cold it is
Something that happens the same way over and over

teachingNotes: Use weather chart for daily observations. Discuss clothing for different weather. Create seasonal books with pictures.
